file.name: common.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: common definitions
servers:
  - url: http://localhost:12000
paths: {}
components:
  schemas:
    Nullable:
      type: object
      nullable: true
      properties:
        field:
          type: string
    ItemId:
      $ref: './transitive.yml#/components/schemas/ItemId'
    Item:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ItemId'
        name:
          type: string
          format: name-format
          pattern: .*
          minLength: 0
          maxLength: 1000
        flag:
          type: boolean
        nullableField:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Nullable'
    ChoiceItem3:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required: 
        - type
      properties:
        type:
          type: string
          enum: ['choice3']
        field3: 
          type: string
    Choice:
      oneOf:
        - type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          required: 
            - type
          properties:
            type:
              type: string
              enum: ['choice1']
            field: 
              type: string
        - type: object
          additionalProperties: false
          required: 
            - type
          properties:
            type:
              type: string
              enum: ['choice2']
            field2: 
              type: string
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/ChoiceItem3"
      discriminator:
        propertyName: type
    Guard:
      type: boolean
      enum:
        - true
